bug.short_desc: __addItem in List controller does wrong lookup

long_desc.thetext: Thanks for the bug, wayne! I wonder how you get that because it only take an effect in really rare situations when no property was bound at all. The bindProperty method sets always the right model type so it should not be a problem in common scenarios. Anyway, I wrote a test for it and fixed it in revision 20960. Thanks!
Because I read your data binding code line by line! Lol, just kidding. I just tried to figure out the meaning of the index passed into my delegate functions and then spotted the little error. :-)
